original_text: And profited in the Jews' religion above many my equals in mine own nation, being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers.
korean_text: 내가 내 동족 중 여러 연갑자보다 유대교를 지나치게 믿어 내 조상의 전통에 대하여 더욱 열심이 있었으나

sentences.original_text: And profited in the Jews' religion

sentences.korean_translation: 나와 동년배 많은 사람들보다 더 나아가

sentences.original_text: of the traditions of my fathers
